metadata.title: CVE-2024-5698 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: By manipulating the fullscreen feature while opening a data-list, anattacker could have overlaid a text box over the address bar. This couldhave led to user confusion and possible spoofing attacks. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 127.

criterions.comment: mozjs78: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs91: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
